title: Ranting.
body:
Alright so I wanna make a rant vid.
I already have a few things in mind on what I wanna speak about.

What do the rest of you want me to try and ran about (Keep in mind that I probably if different opinions, but it would be nice to have additional ideas on what to rant about)

So what are some of the things you guys are sick of?

replies.body:
When you kill the enemy team GO FOR THE GOD DAMN OBJECTIVES.  Buffs can wait.  Don't farm jungle get the damn towers

Dont chase through unwarded jungle

Don't do baren when entire team is up and mia
People who don't know how to counter-build -.-  Just had an Amumu built RE, Swiftness boots, Liandry, Sunfire, then Rylai in that order. Enemy JG was master Yi and he was 0-3 before 15 mins .-.
can we plz get a deadpool {{champion:98}}  skin
Lol yep. thats a good one
Since clawing my way into silver this had not been as much of an issue bit out used to drive me freaking crazy.

Counters exist, but alot of people say X champions counter Gnar.
But I can outplay anyone top lane as gnar.
Its more of a skill counter VS champ Counter.
But that is something good to talk about.
Am referring more to a kit counter. Ie an average ryze can beat a decent fizz because of the kit.

oh ok.
But it can be said that any ryze can beat anyone because of his kit. (1 sec stun CD op)
And the same as Fizz can beat anyone because of his kit XD (Removing himself from the game)

When the skill gap is huge, the better player will win. When the skill gap is narrow, an inferior player gets an edge when they counter pick. Generally mmr based teams dictates that the skill gap is narrow therefore counterpicks are relevant. No bronze ryze will beat a diamond fizz. But I'd put even odds on a silver 3 ryze vs a silver 2 fizz.
how most boards users don't view threads by most recent and in chronological order and how they use the reply button instead of the quote button.
The reply button keeps the conversation nested. Why is that bad?

> [{quoted}](name=Essembie,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=xxkpJ4pr,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-04-06T04:14:07.709+0000)
>
> The reply button keeps the conversation nested. Why is that bad?

because smart people, like myself, view it in chronological order, which is the way it's supposed to be viewed. in chronological order, the first post is at the top of the first page, and the second post is below it, third below that, until you get to the 21st post, which is the first post on the second page. so its like old forums.
and in chronological order, when someone uses reply, it only shows the reply, not the original message, unlike when they use quote.

this is what it looks like when someone uses the boards in the correct way when no one else does
http://i.imgur.com/8FxOdz0.png

What do you mean by that?
(Lemme explain)
My boards show some things higher then others, and sometimes not at all.
And for what ever reason (For me)
When ever I hit the reply options it uses the quote options, and quotes for quotes.
And it just shows all messages in a list/line.
I cant actually see who has replied to who.
Or even if I have replied.
(For instance me to you, I hit reply came up with the quote options. I deleted everything and started typing this. And it will just move to the bottom of the list, I cant see if I have actually replied to you)
